contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary}} '''Bellevue''' ([[French language|French]], meaning ''beautiful view'') can refer to: ==Australia== {{tocright}} * [[Bellevue, Western Australia]] * [[Bellevue Hill, New South Wales]] * [[Bellevue, Glebe]], an historic house in Sydney, New South Wales ==Canada== * [[Bellevue, Alberta]] * [[Bellevue, Newfoundland and Labrador]] **[[Bellevue (electoral district)]] * Bellevue, Ontario, a community in [[Kawartha Lakes, Ontario]] * [[St. Isidore de Bellevue, Saskatchewan]] * [[Bellevue, Edmonton]], a neighbourhood in Edmonton, Alberta ==Denmark== * [[Bellevue Beach]], a beach in Klampenborg north of Copenhagen * [[Bellevue Teatret]], a theatre located next to the beach ==France== * [[Bellevue Palace (France)]], a small château built for Madame de Pompadour near Paris in 1750 overlooking the Seine and demolished in 1823 * [[Bellevue, French Guiana]], a village of French Guiana ==Germany== * [[Bellevue Palace (Germany)]] (Schloss Bellevue), the official residence of the President of Germany, being a château near the center of the city of Berlin ==Sweden== * [[Bellevue (Stockholm)]], a park in [[Stockholm]]. * [[Bellevue (Göteborg)]], a town square in Gamlestan, [[Göteborg]] ==Switzerland== * [[Bellevue, Switzerland]], a municipality in the Canton of Geneva * [[Bellevue (Zurich)]], a town square in Zurich ==United Kingdom== * [[Bellevue, Belfast]] ==United States== ;Communities and historic places * [[Bellevue, California]] * [[Bellvue, Colorado]] * [[Bellevue, Delaware]] * [[Bellevue (Tallahassee, Florida)]], listed on the NRHP in Florida * [[Bellevue (LaGrange, Georgia)]], listed on the NRHP in Georgia *[[Bellevue (Macon)]], community in Macon, Georgia * [[Bellevue, Idaho]] * [[Bellevue, Illinois]] * [[Bellevue, Iowa]] * [[Bellevue, Kentucky]] * [[Bellevue (Newport, Kentucky)]], [[List of RHPs in KY|listed on the NRHP in Kentucky]] * [[Bellevue, Maryland]] * [[Bellevue (Accokeek, Maryland)]], listed on the NRHP in Maryland * [[Bellevue Cemetery]], listed in the NRHP in Lawrence, Massachusetts * [[Bellevue (MBTA station)]] inn West Roxbury, Massachusetts * [[Bellevue, Michigan]] * [[Bellevue Township, Michigan]] * [[Bellevue Township, Minnesota]] * [[Bellevue (Pascagoula, Mississippi)]], [[List of RHPs in MS|listed on the NRHP in Mississippi]] * [[Bellevue, Nebraska]] * [[Bellevue, Schenectady, New York]] * [[Bellevue (Morganton, North Carolina)]], [[List of RHPs in NC|listed on the NRHP in North Carolina]] * [[Bellevue, Ohio]] * [[Bellevue (Kingston, Ohio)]], [[List of RHPs in OH|listed on the NRHP in Ohio]] * [[Bellevue, Oregon]] * [[Bellevue, Pennsylvania]], a suburb of Pittsburgh * [[Bellevue, York County, Pennsylvania]] * [[Bellevue, Tennessee]] * [[Bellevue, Texas]] * Bellevue, now [[Pintura, Utah]] * [[Bellevue (Batesville, Virginia)]], [[List of RHPs in VA|listed on the NRHP in Virginia]] * [[Bellevue (Goode, Virginia)]], [[List of RHPs in VA|listed on the NRHP in Virginia]] * [[Bellevue, Washington]] * [[Bellevue (Washington, D.C.)]] * [[Bellevue, Wisconsin]] ;Other * [[Bellevue Baptist Church]], Memphis, Tennessee * [[Bellevue College]], Bellevue, Washington * [[Bellevue Hospital Center]], New York City, the oldest public hospital in the United States * [[Bellevue University]], Bellevue, Nebraska *[[Bellevue (MBTA station)]], West Roxbury, Massachusetts *[[The Bellevue Hotel (disambiguation)]], a list of hotels by that name ==See also== *[[Belleview (disambiguation)]] *[[Belle Vue (disambiguation)]] {{geodis}}
